admin.title: Grand Theft Auto V
admin.description: Grand Theft Auto V is a 2013 action-adventure game developed by Rockstar North and published by Rockstar Games. It is the seventh main entry in the Grand Theft Auto series, following 2008's Grand Theft Auto IV, and the fifteenth instalment overall. Set within the fictional state of San Andreas, based on Southern California, the single-player story follows three protagonists—retired bank robber Michael De Santa, street gangster Franklin Clinton, and drug dealer Trevor Philips—and their efforts to commit heists while under pressure from a corrupt government agency and powerful criminals.
admin.platform: PC, PlayStation 3, Xbox 360, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series S/X

admin.title: Red Dead Redemption 2
admin.description: Red Dead Redemption 2 is a 2018 action-adventure game developed and published by Rockstar Games. The game is the third entry in the Red Dead series and is a prequel to the 2010 game Red Dead Redemption. The story is set in 1899 and follows the exploits of outlaw Arthur Morgan, a member of the Van der Linde gang, in a fictionalized representation of the Western, Midwestern, and Southern United States.

achievements.name: Lending a Hand
achievements.description: Complete all optional Honor Story Missions.

user1.title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
user1.description: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt is a 2015 action role-playing game developed and published by CD Projekt. Based on The Witcher series of fantasy novels by Andrzej Sapkowski, it is the third main installment in The Witcher video game series and is played in an open world with a third-person perspective.
user1.platform: PC, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch

achievements.name: Passed the Trial
achievements.description: Complete the game on any difficulty.
